alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Lenawee; Livingston; Macomb; Monroe; Oakland; Shiawassee; St. Clair; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 8:58PM EST until January 09 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FREEZING DRIZZLE INCREASING INTENSITY AND A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of light freezing rain and freezing drizzle expected during the late evening hours, producing a light glaze to less than a tenth of an inch of ice. * WHERE...Locations along and south of I-69 including the Detroit metro area to the Ohio border. * WHEN... Now until 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS... Untreated road and walking surfaces will become slick and hazardous. Light icing on objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Increased intensity of freezing drizzle is observed from the Ohio border into metro Detroit as of 9 PM. This is expected to spread north toward Flint and the I-69 corridor between 9 PM and midnight. Scattered freezing rain showers are also possible along and south of I-96/696. Coverage and intensity of precipitation start a diminishing trend after midnight while temperatures rise a few degrees above freezing. Freezing rain and freezing drizzle is expected to end with temperatures above freezing by 4 AM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution while traveling. Allow extra time to reach your destination.
